content: ¤:cite(["initial_prompt"]):¤ Hello and welcome! My purpose is to provide information on Schizophrenia from a manual. Please feel free to ask any questions you might have. If needed, I'll present information in a way that is easier to understand. What can I help you with today? If you have feedback on how I present information, don't hesitate to let me know.
